name: Cops 'n' Robbers World Tour
description:
Grab your plane ticket when you download this exciting app that features famous arcade slots FREE TO PLAY with coins issued to you when you open the app to play.

With one plane ticket you can take your pick between Dublin and London as you start the World Tour slots and mini game play with FREE COINS to be won.

Download the app today and you’ll receive 7,500 free coins to start to conquer the world. Fly to Dublin to play Rainbow Reels, Gemstone Jackpot and Magic Jester. Fly to London and you’ll play Cops N Robbers, Happy Fruits and Jewels of the Sea.

Play the slots for free with your coin credits and collect golden keys in order to unlock the opportunity to play a choice of mini games. The more you play and the more you stake, the more golden keys you’ll unlock and with more keys, you’ll get a wider choice of mini games and slots to play.

The Cops N Robbers World Tour will be extended as further countries quickly become available with other slot games and mini games on offer.

Every day you’ll get the opportunity to play the Mega Bonus Wheel. Give it a spin and see what prizes you’ll land! There are loads of free bonuses to be won and up to 100,000 as the top coin prize. What’s more, the big prize on the wheel is a new plane ticket to start the journey to another country and more fantastic slot game play.

TOP FEATURES
• Slots with FREE SPINS
• BONUS WHEEL available every four hours to spin and win smaller prizes
• Every three BONUS WHEELS spun you’ll have the chance to spin the MEGA BONUS WHEEL with top prizes to be won.
• Fabulous graphics and design, featuring Cops N Robbers character, Bert, and his dog Bonzo
• Once all slots and mini games are unlocked, a further plane ticket is awarded to travel to a different destination

OTHER FEATURES
• Each destination has a featured slot, available to play instantly. The other slots can be played once unlocked by collecting golden keys
• Keys are obtained by building them up with a spin of the reels
• Keys can be used to unlock other games or unlock heist buildings and play mini games
